name: homekit-outlets
description: Self-contained HomeKit server for controlling wireless electrical outlets over radio frequency

scripts.install-globals: sudo apt-get install wiringpi && sudo apt-get install lsof && npm install -g typescript && npm install --global gulp-cli
scripts.preinstall: git submodule init && git submodule update && cd ./bridge/accessories/homebridge-rf-outlet/ && npm install && gulp

author: Trent Rand <contact@trentrand.com>
